languages.text: "Страховка. Всегда нужен тот, на кого спихнешь вину в случае ошибки". {n}Голос Хротко звучит спокойно и даже буднично.{/n} "Можно было подставить Кляйна, но... Эта юная выскочка слишком быстро скакала по чинам и явно целилась на мое место. К тому же она и ее тупые подчиненные все время оказывались там, где нужно было мне".

"A backup plan. You always need someone to blame if you make a mistake." {n}Hrotko's voice sounds calm, even casual.{/n} "I could have framed Klein, but... that young upstart was already galloping through the ranks too fast and was clearly aiming for my station. Besides, she and her thick-witted subordinates were always right where I wanted them to be."
languages.original_text: "Страховка. Всегда нужен тот, на кого спихнешь вину в случае ошибки". {n}Голос Хротко звучит спокойно и даже буднично.{/n} "Можно было подставить Кляйна, но... Эта юная выскочка слишком быстро скакала по чинам и явно целилась на мое место. К тому же она и ее тупые подчиненные все время оказывались там, где нужно было мне".

traits.locale_text: "A backup plan. You always need someone to blame if you make a mistake." {n}Hrotko's voice sounds calm and even casual.{/n} "I could have framed Klein, but... That young upstart had been galloping through the ranks too fast and was clearly aiming for my job. And besides, she and her stupid subordinates were always right where I needed them to be."

"A backup plan. You always need someone to blame if you make a mistake." {n}Hrotko's voice sounds calm and even casual.{/n} "I could have framed Klein, but... Besides, she and her thick-witted subordinates were always right where I wanted them to be."

languages.text: "Als Plan B. Man braucht immer einen Schuldigen, falls man einen Fehler macht." {n}Hrotkos Stimme klingt ruhig, beinahe entspannt.{/n} "Ich hätte Klein alles in die Schuhe schieben können, aber ... dieses junge Miststück hatte sich rasant nach oben gearbeitet und es eindeutig auf meine Position abgesehen. Außerdem waren sie und ihre begriffsstutzigen Untergebenen immer genau dort, wo ich sie haben wollte."
languages.original_text: "A backup plan. You always need someone to blame if you make a mistake." {n}Hrotko's voice sounds calm, even casual.{/n} "I could have framed Klein, but... that young upstart was already galloping through the ranks too fast and was clearly aiming for my station. Besides, she and her thick-witted subordinates were always right where I wanted them to be."

traits.locale_text: "Als Plan B. Man braucht immer einen Schuldigen, falls man einen Fehler macht." {n}Hrotkos Stimme klingt ruhig, beinahe entspannt.{/n} "Ich hätte Klein alles in die Schuhe schieben können, aber ... dieses junge Miststück hatte sich rasant nach oben gearbeitet und es eindeutig auf meine Position abgesehen. Außerdem waren sie und ihre begriffsstutzigen Untergebenen immer genau dort, wo ich sie haben wollte."

languages.text: « Un plan de secours. Il faut toujours avoir quelqu'un à blâmer en cas d'erreur, » {n}ajoute Hrotko d'une voix calme, presque décontractée.{/n} « J'aurais pu faire accuser Klein, mais... cette petite arriviste a gravi les échelons bien trop vite et avait clairement des vues sur mon poste. En plus, avec ses crétins de subordonnées, elle se débrouillait toujours pour se retrouver pile là où j'avais besoin. »
languages.original_text: "A backup plan. You always need someone to blame if you make a mistake." {n}Hrotko's voice sounds calm, even casual.{/n} "I could have framed Klein, but... that young upstart was already galloping through the ranks too fast and was clearly aiming for my station. Besides, she and her thick-witted subordinates were always right where I wanted them to be."

traits.locale_text: « Un plan de secours. Il faut toujours avoir quelqu'un à blâmer en cas d'erreur, » {n}ajoute Hrotko d'une voix calme, presque décontractée.{/n} « J'aurais pu faire accuser Klein, mais... cette petite arriviste a gravi les échelons bien trop vite et avait clairement des vues sur mon poste. En plus, avec ses crétins de subordonnées, elle se débrouillait toujours pour se retrouver pile là où j'avais besoin. »

languages.text: «Un plan de contingencia. Siempre se necesita un chivo expiatorio por si se comete algún error». {n}Hrotko está muy tranquilo, casi indiferente.{/n} «Podría haber inculpado a Klein, pero... esa joven arribista trepaba demasiado rápido por las filas y estaba claro que pretendía arrebatarme mi puesto. Además, ella y los imbéciles de sus subalternos siempre estaban donde yo quería».
languages.original_text: "A backup plan. You always need someone to blame if you make a mistake." {n}Hrotko's voice sounds calm, even casual.{/n} "I could have framed Klein, but... that young upstart was already galloping through the ranks too fast and was clearly aiming for my station. Besides, she and her thick-witted subordinates were always right where I wanted them to be."

traits.locale_text: «Un plan de contingencia. Siempre se necesita un chivo expiatorio por si se comete algún error». {n}Hrotko está muy tranquilo, casi indiferente.{/n} «Podría haber inculpado a Klein, pero... esa joven arribista trepaba demasiado rápido por las filas y estaba claro que pretendía arrebatarme mi puesto. Además, ella y los imbéciles de sus subalternos siempre estaban donde yo quería».

languages.text: 「プランBです。いつだって、ミスをした時のために、責任をなすりつける相手が必要なんですよ」{n}フロトコの声は穏やかで、平然としているようにすら聞こえる。{/n}「クレインを陥れることもできましたけどね…あの若造は出世があまりにも早すぎですし、明らかに私の地位を狙っていました。何より、ジブネリもその頭の悪い部下どもも、いつも私が狙ったとおりの場所にいたんです」
languages.original_text: "A backup plan. You always need someone to blame if you make a mistake." {n}Hrotko's voice sounds calm, even casual.{/n} "I could have framed Klein, but... that young upstart was already galloping through the ranks too fast and was clearly aiming for my station. Besides, she and her thick-witted subordinates were always right where I wanted them to be."

traits.locale_text: 「プランBです。いつだって、ミスをした時のために、責任をなすりつける相手が必要なんですよ」{n}フロトコの声は穏やかで、平然としているようにすら聞こえる。{/n}「クレインを陥れることもできましたけどね…あの若造は出世があまりにも早すぎですし、明らかに私の地位を狙っていました。何より、ジブネリもその頭の悪い部下どもも、いつも私が狙ったとおりの場所にいたんです」

languages.text: “只是个备用计划而已。如果犯了错误，那就必须想办法推到别人身上。”{n}赫洛卡的声音听起来很平静，甚至有些随性。{/n}“我本可以陷害克莱因，不过……杰尼娃那个新来的，升得实在是有点太快了，而且很显然，她是冲着我这个位置来的。不仅如此，她和她那些笨手笨脚的下属总会出现在我希望他们出现的地方。”
languages.original_text: "A backup plan. You always need someone to blame if you make a mistake." {n}Hrotko's voice sounds calm, even casual.{/n} "I could have framed Klein, but... that young upstart was already galloping through the ranks too fast and was clearly aiming for my station. Besides, she and her thick-witted subordinates were always right where I wanted them to be."

traits.locale_text: “只是个备用计划而已。如果犯了错误，那就必须想办法推到别人身上。”{n}赫洛卡的声音听起来很平静，甚至有些随性。{/n}“我本可以陷害克莱因，不过……杰尼娃那个新来的，升得实在是有点太快了，而且很显然，她是冲着我这个位置来的。不仅如此，她和她那些笨手笨脚的下属总会出现在我希望他们出现的地方。”

languages.text: "O yedek plandı. Hata yaptığında suçlayacak birini her zaman hazırda tutmalısın." {n}Hrotko'nun sesine sakinlik, hatta rahat bir ton hâkim.{/n} "Suçu Klein'a yıkardım ama... O küstah velet, rütbeleri son sürat atlamaya başlamıştı bile. Hedefinde istasyonumun olduğu açıktı. Ayrıca Jinevri ile kalın kafalı maiyeti, sürekli tam istediğim yerde bitiveriyorlardı."
languages.original_text: "A backup plan. You always need someone to blame if you make a mistake." {n}Hrotko's voice sounds calm, even casual.{/n} "I could have framed Klein, but... that young upstart was already galloping through the ranks too fast and was clearly aiming for my station. Besides, she and her thick-witted subordinates were always right where I wanted them to be."
